sentences.en: There are pretty clear differences between signs of dementia and age-related memory loss.
sentences.cn: 痴呆症的症状和增龄性记忆丧失症的症状之间有非常明显的区别。

sentences.en: I think of it as preventive medicine for age-related conditions.
sentences.cn: 我认为它是与年龄相关疾病的预防医学。

sentences.en: The caloric-restricted animals also look better on indicators of risk for age-related diseases.
sentences.cn: 限制热量摄入的动物在与年龄相关的疾病风险指标上也表现得更好。
